nl.esciencecenter.xenon.jobs

Interface Job


  • public interface Job
    Job represents a job that has been submitted to a Scheduler.

    When a JobDescription is submitted to a Scheduler using Jobs.submitJob, a Job is returned. This Job can be used to retrieve the status of the job using Jobs.getJobStatus, cancel the job using Jobs.cancelJob, or wait until the job terminates using Jobs.waitUntilDone.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Niels Drost , Jason Maassen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getIdentifier()
      Returns the identifier that was assigned to this job by the scheduler.
      JobDescription getJobDescription()
      Returns the JobDescription that was used to create this Job.
      Scheduler getScheduler()
      Returns the Scheduler that was used to create this Job.
      boolean isInteractive()
      Returns if this is an interactive job.
      boolean isOnline()
      Returns if this is an online job.

    • Method Detail

      • getJobDescription

        JobDescription getJobDescription()
        Returns the JobDescription that was used to create this Job.
        Returns:
        the JobDescription that belongs to this Job

      • getScheduler

        Scheduler getScheduler()
        Returns the Scheduler that was used to create this Job.
        Returns:
        the Scheduler used to create this job.

      • getIdentifier

        String getIdentifier()
        Returns the identifier that was assigned to this job by the scheduler.
        Returns:
        the identifier that was assigned to this job by the scheduler.

      • isInteractive

        boolean isInteractive()
        Returns if this is an interactive job.
        Returns:
        if this is an interactive job.

      • isOnline

        boolean isOnline()
        Returns if this is an online job. Online jobs will disappear when the application that submitted is exist, while ofline jobs will keep running. Interactive jobs are by definition online. Batch jobs will be online if the scheduler to which they were submitted is online.
        Returns:
        if this is an online job.
